definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Chinese medical knowledge surpasses science and includes the science of human body!
sentences.chinese: 中華醫道超越科學，並可包容人體科學。

sentences.english: If I say hell, instant solutions to be proficient in his will encounter to evil.
sentences.chinese: 我若再說自己精通醫道，手到病除，必將遭來禍害。

sentences.english: I am something of a doctor;
On the dragon Ze road, the coal medicine road junction toward a northern spot, some people calls that young Bai building.
sentences.chinese: 在龍澤路上，煤醫道口往北一點，有人叫那小白樓。

definition: to feel the pulse (TCM)/Taiwan pr. [zhen3 mo4]
lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education
scholarship/high-level study/to do scholarly research/to pursue a high level of study
instructing with tireless zeal (idiom, from Analects)
after that, any remaining energy (idiom from Analects); time for extracurricular activities
when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
